Description.Text: The Radha Regent is a modern 4-star superior property, offering luxury accommodation in Bangalore's Electronics Centre area. The hotel boasts a swimming pool, a fitness centre and all-day dining options. The hotel is located in the Electronic City, Bangalore's IT hub, which sits to the southeast of the city. The district is home to many regional attractions, such as the Bannerghatta National Park, The Forum and the Botanical Gardens. Other local attractions include the Bull Temple and the Garuda Mall. The hotel is housed in a 7-storey building that blends both modern and traditional styles. Facilities include a large outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Guests can also play pool in the bar area and access free Wi-Fi in public areas. All-day dining is offered in the chic Lobby Cafe, where guests can enjoy a combination of Eastern and Western flavours against excellent views of the lobby. The Aura lounge bar meanwhile serves gourmet food and an extensive wine list in a relaxed pool front setting. The air-conditioned Superior rooms feature contemporary decor and measure approximately 30sqm. They come with an en-suite bathroom, complete with a bathtub and walk-in shower, and they have a wide variety of amenities, including a large writing desk, high-speed Wi-Fi, a mini-bar and a flat-screen TV. The hotel offers a laundry service, and parking is available onsite.
